snippet: With Jeremy Lin not expected to play Wednesday, and Baron Davis’s knee requiring surgery that will keep him out a year, the veteran Mike Bibby will start at point guard for the Knicks.
abstract: New York Knicks will open Game 5 of playoff series against Miami Heat with veteran Mike Bibby at point guard; having lost guards Iman Shumpert and Baron Davis to injuries, and Jeremy Lin's return from knee surgery unlikely to come in time, the Knicks are running out of options.
lead_paragraph: With Jeremy Lin not expected to play Wednesday, and Baron Davis’s knee requiring surgery that will keep him out a year, the veteran Mike Bibby will start at point guard for the Knicks.

headline.seo: For Knicks in Game 5, Odds Are Long and Bench Is Short
headline.main: For Knicks, the Odds Are Long and the Bench Is Short
headline.print_headline: Knicks Are Running Out Of Guards and Time
